item.title: Mimic a SWITCH function in Power Query using Record.FieldOrDefault - YouTube
item.description:
Mimic a SWITCH function in Power Query using Record.FieldOrDefault - YouTube

The SWITCH function allows users to map input values to corresponding output values. In this video, you learn how to apply this concept in Power Query by usi…
